name: Dash n Beat
description:
Dash n Beat is a new challenge for music lover gamers

Let’s join this rhythm adventure and push your limit with hand speed!
Your goal is SUPER DUPER ULTRA MEGA EASY!! Just feel the beat and TAP TAP the screen to control the lighting dot to finish the music strings.

What’s hot in Dash n Beat?

New gameplay
Beautiful twinkle effects
Top hottest songs to DASH
Easy to play but hard to achieve with such CRAZY TRACKS
Make the longest perfect combo ever!


DON’T HESITATE BECOMING A TAP MASTER RIGHT NOW !!
